title: cinnamon apple crisp muffins
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Line 12 cups of a muffin tin with paper liners.
In a medium bowl, whisk together dry ingredients.
Add the oil, egg and milk and stir until well combined.
Fill each paper liner two-thirds full with batter.
In a small bowl, mix topping ingredients until blended together. Sprinkle evenly over unbaked muffins.
Bake until a wooden pick inserted in center of a muffin comes out clean, about 15 to 20 minutes.

How to make chef Carla Hall's peanut butter and strawberry muffins with crumble topping
